title: Just an actual fucking bomb
desc:
Post 360
-Put a bomb on the table. The first person to say “I want to attempt to defuse the bomb” will attempt to defuse the bomb
-The person who played the card must create 3 challenges for the defuser to attempt
-If the person who is defusing the bomb fails one of the challenges, it explodes and they leave the game (they fucking die)
-If nobody defuses the bomb, then the deck explodes scattering cards everywhere, causing everyone to gain 5 cards except for the person who played this card, because they’re wearing bomb gear
